title: Whitepaper: 5 Secrets to perfecting your Lead to Revenue model
author: techradar-pro
summary: 5 ways to refresh your Lead to Revenue model for increased revenue.
article: By 2023, Statista estimates that the Lead-Generation industry will be worth a whopping $3.2 billion. In 2019, it was already worth $2.6 billion. That's truly substantial growth in a short period, and a lot of lead-generation competition to consider too.
Lead to revenue management is essential to the overall sales and success of your company. After all, 53% of marketers spend half their budget on it.
So, how can you make sure your business's Lead to revenue model stays profitable amongst the competition?
Learn the five best-kept industry secrets about increasing the performance of your lead to revenue model in Televerde's whitepaper today.
